titles.title: Concerning the release of the American hostages in Somalia and United States Armed Forces withdrawal.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Africa.
Referred to the Subcommittee on International Security, International Organizations and Human Rights.

committee.name: House Foreign Affairs
committee.subcommittee: International Security, International Organizations, and Human Rights

bill.summary: 10/7/1993--Introduced. Urges the President to obtain the release of the members of the U.S. armed forces who are hostages in Somalia and to prepare a plan for the immediate withdrawal of U.S. armed forces from Somalia.
